title: Gracie the Ghost Eater
description: Gracie eats dead people, or at least she eats their ghosts. After her parents unexpectedly move across the street from a cemetery, Gracie starts eating more ghosts than ever before. The ghosts quickly become fed up with Gracie's growing appetite, choosing to trap her in the underworld. Gracie's only chance of returning to the land of the living is to complete three impossible tasks chosen by the infamous Ghost Council. Is Gracie up for the job or will she spend eternity with the ghosts?
author: Steven Symes
